## Description {#details}

A utility class to create <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff">COFF</a> dllimport GOT symbols (&#95;&#95;imp&#95;&#42;) and PLT stubs.

If an instance of this class is attached to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> as a fallback definition generator, PLT stubs and dllimport &#95;&#95;imp&#95; symbols will be generated for external symbols found outside the given jitdylib. Currently only supports x86&#95;64 architecture.

Definition at line 351 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### tryToGenerate() {#a28474a2103675aa30411c3cc01585b0c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::orc::DLLImportDefinitionGenerator::tryToGenerate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lookupstate">LookupState</a> &amp; LS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#ac17672ae6b70c781cc77713e88d698eb">LookupKind</a> K, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a7cb1d8cb0ab2329f032d69d79498c81d">JITDylibLookupFlags</a> JDLookupFlags, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbollookupset">SymbolLookupSet</a> &amp; LookupSet)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
DefinitionGenerators should override this method to insert new definitions into the parent <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a>.

K specifies the kind of this lookup. JD specifies the target <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> being searched, and JDLookupFlags specifies whether the search should match against hidden symbols. Finally, Symbols describes the set of unresolved symbols and their associated lookup flags.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h/#l00357">357</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp/#l00485">485</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp">ExecutionUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
